description.name: Combination Plier 6" Polished
description.long_desc:
Combination pliers - 160mm 


Straight pliers, made of steel, length 160mm. Perfect tool for a variety of applications. Made of high quality materials. A precise device for cutting both soft and hard wire.


Use:


In the workshop, service, home, insulation, as well as cutting various types of wire or holding elements, mechanical parts.

description.name: Bentnose Pipe Wrench Swedish Type 1" GEKO Profi
description.long_desc:
Swedish Type narrow-profile pipe wrench fits into places a normal pipe wrench couldn’t reach.


Product Features



  • Sturdy shaped, epoxy powder painted Chrome Vanadium steel

  • Tempered jaws to guarantee robustness and durability

  • Head slant 45° for enhanced access

  • Knurled adjusting nut with guiding reinforcement on handle


Technical Data



  • Jaw Type: S 45°

  • Handle Type: Swedish Pattern

  • Maximum Jaw Capacity: 1"
description.short_desc:
Swedish Type narrow-profile pipe wrench fits into places a normal pipe wrench couldn’t reach.

description.name: Flat-typed Hose Clamp Pliers
description.long_desc:
Suitable for removal of tag and wire type hose clips.


Product Features



  • 5-step ratchet locking mechanism for easy use on lower radiator hoses

  • Swivel jaws allow use where access is confined

  • PVC coated handles for improved grip and comfort


Technical Data



  • Overall Length: 215 mm

description.name: Flexible Long Reach Hose Clamp Pliers
description.long_desc:
Flexible Long Reach Hose Clamp Pliers. 660mm flexible cable and compact head helps access hard-to-reach hose clamps.


Product Features



  • One-hand operation - release the fixing device simply by pressing the button at the handle

  • Bowden cable allows working without a guiding hand and is suitable for overhead working

  • 9-step ratchet locking mechanism for easy use on lower radiator hoses

  • PVC coated handles for improved grip and comfort
description.short_desc:

description.long_desc:

Product Features



  • PVC coated handles for grip and comfort

description.long_desc: CV Joint Clamp Banding Tool suitable for installation and tightening of band-style clamps on CV joint boots, power steering rack and pinion steering gear boots. Built-in cutter for the band cutting.

description.name: Bending Throat Type Hose Clamp Pliers
description.long_desc:
Used to compress spring type hose clamps in tight areas. Jaws are bent at a 45 degree angle.


Product Features



  • The clamps are held open with a 8-step ratchet locking mechanism

  • Swivel jaws allow use where access is confined

  • PVC coated handles for improved grip and comfort


Technical Data



  • Working Range: 18 - 54 mm

  • Overall Length: 212 mm

description.name: Hose Clamp Pliers Set Assortment 9pc
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Include 7 different pliers allows for extra reach and locking of clamps into open position

  • Pliers can be locked to keep your hands free thanks to ratchet locking mechanism

  • Complete with blow mould case


Package Contents:



  • 1x Hose clamp pliers

  • 1x Swivel jaw spring wire clip pliers

  • 1x Swivel jaw band clip pliers

  • 1x Angled flat band hose clamp pliers

  • 1x Hose remover pliers

  • 1x Clic-R collar pliers

  • 1x Flat band hose clamp pliers

  • 1x Screwdriver

  • 1x Hose remover

description.name: CV Boot Clamp Pliers Ear Type
description.long_desc:
CV Boot Clamp Pliers suitable for Oetiker CV Drive Shaft boot securing clips. Plier's plate presses a flat on the top of the clip so that it forms the spring loop correctly.


Product Features



  • Can be used with 1/2" drive Power Bar or Ratchet

  • PVC coated handles for grip and comfort

description.name: Circlip Pliers 6" 4pcs
description.long_desc:
Circlip Pliers designed for assembly and disassembly of circlips.


A set of circlip pliers enables the assembly and disassembly of internal (expanding inside the sleeve) and external (clamping outside the shaft) circlips. The set includes 4 types of pliers.


Made of high-quality CrV chrome vanadium steel, pliers handles are covered with non-slip rubber.


Product Characteristics:


made of high-quality CrV chrome vanadium steel
handles covered with non-slip rubber
pliers length 160mm 6"
two types of pliers - straight and bent
designed for the assembly and disassembly of internal and external sprockets


Kit Contents:


sheet for pliers
external straight pliers 160mm / 6"
outside pliers bent 160mm / 6"
internal straight pliers 160mm / 6"
internal bent pliers 160mm / 6"
description.short_desc:
Circlip Pliers designed for assembly and disassembly of circlips.


A set of circlip pliers enables the assembly and disassembly of internal (expanding inside the sleeve) and external (clamping outside the shaft) circlips. The set includes 4 types of pliers.


Made of high-quality CrV chrome vanadium steel, pliers handles are covered with non-slip rubber.


Product Characteristics:

description.name: Circlip Pliers 8"
description.long_desc:
Circlip Pliers designed for the assembly and disassembly of circlips.


A set of pliers enables the assembly and disassembly of internal (expanding inside the sleeve) and external (clamping outside the shaft) circlips. The set includes 4 types of pliers.


Made of high-quality CrV chrome vanadium steel, pliers handles are covered with non-slip rubber.

category.name: Pipe Wrenches
category.path: Tools for Plumbers\Pipe Wrenches

category_idosell.path: Tools for Plumbers\Pipe Wrenches

description.name: Heavy Duty Straight Pipe Wrench 10" GEKO Profi
description.long_desc:
Heavy-duty Straight Pipe Wrench used for turning soft iron pipes and fittings with a rounded surface. The design of the adjustable jaw allows it to lock in the frame, such that any forward pressure on the handle tends to pull the jaws tighter together. Teeth angled in the direction of turn dig into the soft pipe.


Product Features



  • Sturdy cast iron frame

  • Full floating forged hook jaw

  • Large knurl and threads provide fast jaw adjustment


Technical Data



  • Jaw Type: Standard

  • Maximum Jaw Capacity: 50 mm

  • Length: 10"
description.short_desc:

description.name: 9pcs Ball End Hex Key Set 1.5-10mm 260mm
description.long_desc:
Long Arm Ball End Hex Key Wrench Set 1.5 - 10mm. Set includes 9-piece long arm hex key wrenches: 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10 mm.


Product Features



  • Heat treated chrome-vanadium alloy steel

  • Ball ends allow up to a 25 degree entry angle to reach around obstructions

  • Hinged case opens flat

  • Long arm wrenches provide extra reach and greater torque

  • Sizes marked on case for fast size selection

  • Set includes 9-piece long arm hex key wrenches: 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10 mm

  • The longest key length 260mm

  • Chamfered edges allows easy insertion onto fasteners

  • Hinged case opens flat

  • Long arm wrenches provide extra reach and greater torque

  • Sizes marked on case for fast size selection

  • Set includes 9-piece long arm torx key wrenches: T10, T15, T20, T25, T27, T30, T40, T45, T50, T55
